body:
Checking out the logger, I notice a few things are getting `dispatch`ed that don't necessarily need to. For instance, `ACTION_RECEIVE` fires on _every_ received recipe, even if the action already exists in the store.

I suspect we could trim these duplicate `dispatch`es and see a performance increase.
body_text:
Checking out the logger, I notice a few things are getting dispatched that don't necessarily need to. For instance, ACTION_RECEIVE fires on every received recipe, even if the action already exists in the store.
I suspect we could trim these duplicate dispatches and see a performance increase.
body_html:
Checking out the logger, I notice a few things are getting dispatched that don't necessarily need to. For instance, ACTION_RECEIVE fires on every received recipe, even if the action already exists in the store.

I suspect we could trim these duplicate dispatches and see a performance increase.
